title: Update shoe gallery with men's branded footwear

requirements.summary: Replace all shoe gallery images with men's footwear from major brands including Adidas, Nike, Puma, and Asian
acceptanceCriteria: All 5 shoe images in the gallery display men's footwear only
Shoe images represent brands: Adidas, Nike, Puma, Asian, and at least one additional brand
Each shoe product title reflects the actual brand name
Images maintain the existing 2-column grid layout

file_operations.description: Update the products array to reference the 5 new generated men's shoe images using their workspace paths: frontend/public/assets/generated/adidas-mens-shoe.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/nike-mens-shoe.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/puma-mens-shoe.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/asian-mens-shoe.dim_800x600.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/other-brand-mens-shoe.dim_800x600.png. Replace the existing shoe image references while maintaining the 2-column grid layout structure and luxury theme styling.

requirements.summary: Update shoe product titles and descriptions to match the new men's branded footwear images
acceptanceCriteria: Product titles include brand names (e.g., 'Nike Air Max', 'Adidas Ultraboost')
Descriptions emphasize men's styling and brand authenticity
All text remains consistent with luxury branding theme

file_operations.description: Update the product titles in the products array to include specific brand names (e.g., 'Adidas Ultraboost', 'Nike Air Max', 'Puma RS-X', 'Asian Marathon') and revise descriptions to emphasize men's footwear styling and brand authenticity while maintaining the luxury theme tone and existing component structure.
